Class MainMenuPreferences

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.mainMenu.MainMenuPreferences
public class MainMenuPreferences extends Object
Helper that loads and saves main-menu related preferences using the Preferences API.

Responsibilities: - Read and write control key bindings (single-player and two-player keys). - Read and write handling settings (timings and gameplay toggles).

Notes: - All persistence is stored in a Preferences node scoped to MainMenuController.class. - load* methods always return a non-null settings object; individual key fields may be null if no binding or an invalid value is stored. - When saving key bindings, a null field is persisted as an empty string. - This class does not perform FX-thread marshaling because it only accesses the user preferences store; callers should perform any required UI-thread actions themselves.

      public MainMenuPreferences()

  • Method Details

    • loadControlSettings

      public MainMenuControlSettings loadControlSettings()
      Load and return the persisted control key bindings.
      Returns:
      a freshly allocated MainMenuControlSettings populated from preferences. The returned object is never null; individual KeyCode fields may be null if no value was stored or the stored value could not be parsed.

    • saveControlSettings

      public void saveControlSettings(MainMenuControlSettings cs)
      Persist control key bindings from the provided settings object.

      Null key fields are persisted as an empty string. This method has the side-effect of writing to the platform preferences store; callers should be prepared for platform-specific behavior and possible SecurityExceptions in restricted environments.

      Parameters:
      cs - the settings to persist; may be the same instance previously returned by loadControlSettings() but must not be null.

    • loadHandlingSettings

      public MainMenuHandlingSettings loadHandlingSettings()
      Load persisted handling (timing and gameplay) settings.
      Returns:
      a newly created MainMenuHandlingSettings populated from preferences. Returns default values when no preference exists.

    • saveHandlingSettings

      public void saveHandlingSettings(MainMenuHandlingSettings hs)
      Persist handling settings into the preferences store.
      Parameters:
      hs - the handling settings to persist; must not be null.
